title: Get mention content in brand hashtags

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok Business Accounts. To obtain an access token, use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok Business Account. You can get the ID through the open_id field returned by /tt_user/oauth2/token/ .

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Requested fields. If fields is not set, only the default fields will be returned. Default value: ["item_id","caption"] . Supported fields : item_id : Unique identifier for the post. create_time : Unix/epoch date-time when the post was posted. video_link : A generic URL for the post. caption : The description for the post. likes : Total number of likes on the post. comments : Total number of comments on the post. shares : Total number of times the post has been shared. thumbnail_url : The URL of the post thumbnail. matched_hashtags : A list of brand hashtags in the post caption that match the hashtags configured for the business.

parameters.name: sort_field
parameters.description: The field to sort the result by. Enum values: CREATE_TIME : The field create_time . LIKES : The field likes . COMMENTS : The field comments . SHARES : The field shares . Default value: CREATE_TIME .

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Sorting order. Enum values: ASC : Ascending. DESC : Descending. Default value: DESC .

parameters.name: number_of_days
parameters.description: The lookback period for the results, measured in days. Value range: 1-90. Default value: 90. For instance, if you set this field to 90, the results for the last 90 days will be retrieved.

parameters.name: regions
parameters.description: The regions of posts that you want to filter the results by. If you specify this field, only posts posted by TikTok users registered in the specified regions will be returned. If this field is not specified, all relevant posts that contain brand hashtags will be returned. To learn about the allowed values for this field, refer to List of values for regions .

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination. The position of the results that you want to retrieve from. For instance, setting cursor to 10 means you want to retrieve the next page of results after the 10th position. If the response parameter has_more is true , pass the returned cursor in this parameter in the subsequent request to receive the next page of results. Default value: 0.

parameters.name: max_count
parameters.description: The maximum number of hashtags that will be returned for each page of data. Default value: 10. Note : Due to our trust and safety policies, it is possible that the endpoint returns less than the max_count number of hashtags even if the response parameter has_more is true .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: item_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the post. Example: 6995316737801538821 .

fields.name: create_time
fields.description: Unix/epoch date-time when the post was posted, in UTC timezone. Example: 1628461703 .

fields.name: video_link
fields.description: The generic URL of the post, in the format of https://www.tiktok.com/@/video/ . Example: https://www.tiktok.com/@/video/7231234123412341234 . item_id

fields.name: caption
fields.description: Post description. Example: Nuki: me and me casa üè† #cat #kitten #britishshorthair .

fields.name: likes
fields.description: Total number of likes on the post. Example: 243.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: Total number of comments on the post. Example: 10.

fields.name: shares
fields.description: Total number of times the post has been shared. Example: 10.

fields.name: thumbnail_url
fields.description: The URL of the post thumbnail. Validity period: 48 hours. The expiration time is included in the URL after the x-expires parameter, in the format of an Epoch/Unix timestamp in seconds. Example: https://p16-sign-sg.tiktokcdn.com/tos-maliva-p-0068/1f9a445423844b82bd79317b42b9953f~c5_300x400.webp?x-expires=1614034800&x-signature=qChosOGafzBcTctPm9zYiF8Y2MA%3D .

fields.name: matched_hashtags
fields.description: A list of brand hashtags in the post caption that match the hashtags configured for the business. Example: [\"tiktok\", \"tiktokrunning\"] .

fields.name: cursor
fields.description: Cursor for the next page of results, to be passed in the cursor query parameter of the subsequent API request.

fields.name: has_more
fields.description: Whether an additional page of data is available.
